client.offlineMessage: You're offline. Some features may be limited.

hero.title: Transform Your Mental Health Practice
hero.subtitle: Streamline client management, automate workflows, and scale your practice with intelligent tools designed for mental health professionals.

painPoints.title: The Challenges You Face Every Day
painPoints.subtitle: Running a mental health practice shouldn't be this hard
painPoints.point1Description: Hours spent on scheduling, notes, and paperwork instead of helping clients
painPoints.point2Description: Juggling spreadsheets and documents to track client progress and outcomes
painPoints.point3Description: Struggling to grow your practice without hiring more administrative staff
painPoints.point4Description: Clients miss sessions, forget tasks, and lose engagement between appointments
painPoints.point5Description: Missing valuable insights into client progress and program effectiveness
painPoints.point6Description: Switching between multiple platforms for scheduling, notes, and client management

solution.title: Your All-in-One Solution
solution.subtitle: Everything you need to run a successful mental health practice
solution.description: Built specifically for mental health professionals who want to focus on what matters most: helping their clients.

ai.title: AI-Powered Insights
ai.description: Get intelligent recommendations and insights to help you make better decisions for your clients.
ai.benefit: Save 5+ hours per week on analysis

builder.title: Program Builder
builder.description: Create structured programs with automated workflows that guide clients through their journey.

tracking.title: Progress Tracking
tracking.description: Monitor client progress in real-time with comprehensive analytics and reporting tools.

platformFeatures.title: Everything You Need in One Platform
platformFeatures.subtitle: No more juggling email, spreadsheets, and documents. Create activities, track progress, and communicate with clients in one secure platform.

features.title: Comprehensive Platform Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need in one integrated solution

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.description: Intelligent recommendations and insights powered by advanced AI technology

programs.title: Program Builder
programs.description: Create structured, automated programs that guide clients through their mental health journey

tracking.title: Progress Analytics
tracking.description: Real-time tracking and comprehensive analytics to monitor client outcomes

groups.title: Group Sessions

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.description: Automated scheduling with calendar integration and session reminders

library.title: Resource Library

security.title: HIPAA Compliant
security.description: Enterprise-grade security and compliance to protect sensitive client information

white_label.title: White Label
white_label.description: Customize the platform with your branding for a seamless client experience

security.title: HIPAA-Compliant Security Built In
security.subtitle: Your clients' data is protected with enterprise-grade security
security.description: We understand the critical importance of protecting sensitive mental health information. Our platform is fully HIPAA compliant and built with security as a core foundation.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols

compliance.title: HIPAA Compliant
compliance.description: Fully compliant with HIPAA regulations and regularly audited for compliance

access.title: Access Controls
access.description: Granular access controls ensure only authorized personnel can access client data

backup.title: Secure Backups
backup.description: Regular automated backups with secure storage and disaster recovery protocols

testimonials.title: Trusted by Mental Health Professionals
testimonials.subtitle: See what coaches are saying about our platform

martin.quote: This platform has transformed how I manage my practice. I can now focus on what I do best - helping my clients.
martin.name: Martin Hansen

soren.quote: The AI insights have been game-changing. I can see patterns I never noticed before and provide better care.

janni.quote: My clients love the structured programs. They're more engaged and seeing better results than ever.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Making mental health support accessible and effective
mission.description: We believe that everyone deserves access to quality mental health support. Our platform empowers mental health professionals to help more people, more effectively, while reducing administrative burden and increasing focus on client care.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: Get started in three simple steps

step1.title: Book a Demo
step1.description: Schedule a personalized demo to see how the platform can transform your practice

step2.title: Get Set Up
step2.description: Our team will help you customize the platform and migrate your existing data

step3.title: Start Growing
step3.description: Begin using the platform and watch your practice scale while you focus on clients

second.title: Ready to Transform Your Practice?
second.subtitle: Join hundreds of mental health professionals who are already using our platform

final.title: Start Your Free Demo Today
final.subtitle: See how our platform can help you scale your practice and improve client outcomes
final.disclaimer: No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform

q1.question: Is the platform HIPAA compliant?
q1.answer: Yes, we are fully HIPAA compliant with enterprise-grade security measures to protect all client data.

q2.question: How long does it take to set up?
q2.answer: Most practices are up and running within 24-48 hours. Our team provides full onboarding support.

q3.question: Can I customize the platform?
q3.answer: Yes, the platform is fully white-label and can be customized with your branding and colors.

q4.question: What kind of support do you offer?
q4.answer: We offer 24/7 support via email and chat, plus dedicated onboarding assistance for new customers.

q5.question: Can I integrate with my existing tools?
q5.answer: Yes, we offer integrations with popular calendar systems, video conferencing platforms, and more.
